name: BOROS
description: Boros is a 2D puzzle/action endless game inspired by the greatest hits like Zuma and Luxor, designed for both casual and hardcore players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and above Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: HD Graphics 500 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: HD Graphics 510 Storage: 1 GB available space
